alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:22PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern White Pine County through 145 PM PDT... At 122 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Schellbourne. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Localized moderate to heavy rain that could produce flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern White Pine County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
